Welcome to BearPaw U

    BearPaw U is on a Legal Education Mission to make online learning as fun, rewarding, and fast as possible! Earn BearBucks for each completed course and swap 'em for some sweet SWAG!

    Missing 101

    If someone in your family or community has gone missing, you need to get the facts quick. Join BearPaw U Professor Cayenne for the 101 on Reporting a Missing Person in Alberta. We will also explore the issue of historical distrust between Indigenous communities and the police - and how that distrust can impact the search for our people.

    First Appearance in Provincial Court

    If you have been arrested and charged, but were not kept in custody, you will have an upcoming First Appearance in Alberta Provincial Court.

    More from BearPaw U!

    Rights with Police

    Fresh out of Police Academy, there’s a lot of rules to remember! Good thing Raven took notes! Whether it’s interacting with the public on foot, in their vehicle or at home, Raven’s got the goods!

    I.D. Opens Doors

    Does the thought of applying for I.D. stress you out? Want to replace that birth certificate you lost 4 years ago? BearPaw U's got you covered! Take our I.D. Opens Doors Course to learn about getting your Alberta I.D., and more!

    Got Court? Bail, Gladue Reports and Sentencing

    Got Court? Whether it’s a bail hearing, sentencing, or requesting a Gladue Report, BearPaw U’s got the basics! Click through this entertaining short story to learn more!
